com.purkkapussi.sinkdashipz.domain.highscores

Class HighScoreHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.purkkapussi.sinkdashipz.domain.highscores.HighScoreHandler

  • public class HighScoreHandler
extends Object
    Class to handle reading and writing and printing highs cores using the writer and reader classes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HighScoreHandler()
      Constructor that tries to read highs cores using the reader class.
      HighScoreHandler(ArrayList<HighScore> highscores)
      Constructor with high score list as parameter.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int addHighScore(String name, int points)
      Adds a new high score to the high score list, sorts the list and writes to file using the writer class.
      void resetHighScores()
      Method wipes the high score list and writes the (empty) list into file.
      String tenBestHighScores()
      Method returns a string consisting of the top ten high scores preceeded by rank and separated by line change.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • HighScoreHandler

        public HighScoreHandler()
        Constructor that tries to read highs cores using the reader class.

      • HighScoreHandler

        public HighScoreHandler(ArrayList<HighScore> highscores)
        Constructor with high score list as parameter. Used for testing.
        Parameters:
        highscores - ArrayList of HighScores

    • Method Detail

      • addHighScore

        public int addHighScore(String name,
                        int points)
        Adds a new high score to the high score list, sorts the list and writes to file using the writer class. Returns the rank of the player compared to other high scores.
        Parameters:
        name - Players name
        points - Players score
        Returns:
        rank of the player as Integer

      • resetHighScores

        public void resetHighScores()
        Method wipes the high score list and writes the (empty) list into file.

      • tenBestHighScores

        public String tenBestHighScores()
        Method returns a string consisting of the top ten high scores preceeded by rank and separated by line change.
        Returns:
        String of high scores in ranked order separated by line change.
